articles.author: Annie Nova
articles.title: White House administration extends payment pause for student loan borrowers through January - CNBC
articles.description: The 42 million Americans with student debt will not have to resume their payments until February, according to an announcement Friday by the White House.
articles.content:
The Biden administration announced Friday it will extend the payment pause for federal student loan borrowers through January 2022.
Since March 2020, borrowers have been given the option to press th… [+1817 chars]
